name: Color Slash VR
description:
Slash some colorful cylinder in VR, using your amazing ninja skills !

Slash carefully !

Each time you cut a cynlinder your sword's color will change.

Your sword need to be matching the cynlinder's color in order to score points !

You have 3 chances and 2 minutes, each time you cut the wrong color a blue column will disapear.

At the end of the timer or if you fail a third time, it's GAME OVER !

This is a Virtual Reality arcade game for the HTC Vive.

You only need one controller to play this game.
